Coming soon

Melissa Amaya

Hello! Welcome to my page. I've never been comfortable writing an "about me" section, but I always appreciate reading well constructed pages from others. If I was fancy enough to have a publicist, I've just have them write this section, but alas, I am just me.

I toyed with the decision of writing in 1st vs. 3rd person. Which to choose?

Third person makes me sound extra-important. But it also feels inauthentic.

So I give you a mix:

-----

Never having been content with taking the easy route, Melissa’s life has been a series of adventures, with the occasional nosedive.

Amidst an unwanted divorce, caring for four children while being displaced from her apartment (the p.c. way to say “homeless”), followed by an epic road trip with the hopes of landing upright, life has been a process of navigating one roadblock after another.

Put another way, life has been about calling DO-OVER when life hasn’t quite turned out as planned.

At age 36, after being out of the workforce for over a decade, Melissa attended Flatiron Bootcamp. This completely changed the financial trajectory for her family. She went on to earn an MCIT from Penn. (It is totally okay to go into tech for the 💰)

Melissa is an author, teacher, entrepreneur and mother to four amazing kids.

She was a D1 soccer player, holds a black belt in Isshinryu karate and is a Scuba instructor. (one of these facts is a lie — kudos if you can figure out which one).

-----

Okay, I'm back!

And I'm glad you are here.

2 Corinthians 1:3-5 tells us that "[God] comforts us in all our affliction, so that we may be able to comfort those who are in any affliction, with the comfort with which we ourselves are comfortated by God."

This website exists with the hope that my experiences, my challenges, my successes and even my failures might provide comfort or encouragement to you.

My ultimate goal in this life is to earn the commendation, "Well done, good and faithful servant" when I graduate from this life into eternal life. I hope you see you there.
